name: The Cookie Incident
description:
The Cookie Incident is a puzzle game about Robin Dabank, a great theif. 

The art was made by Bowser13, and the game was made by Blai8. 

We also want to thank Pau, Anna and Martina, because without their help on building levels we probably would've given up. 

We are sorry to have thoose few levels, but this is my first game, and i really spent a lot of time with the gameplay. 

The sound effects are homemade but the music is made by Wasooo666 (https://soundcloud.com/wazoo666) .

And last but not least, we want to thank you for playing our game, it really means the world to us. Have a great time!
